desc: A curated shopping experience with hand crafted artwork including: Paintings on canvas, ceramics (pottery), wooden creations, textile designs and more from local, regional and international artisans. Our studio is busy teaching painting and ceramics to children and adults. Special events and group classes available.

layout.text: Shop the Best local and regional artwork or join us for a fun Art Class!

Hand crafted ceramics, acrylic and oil paintings, unique wooden furniture and accessories, hand made cards, custom created home portraits, and much more. Find us on Facebook @Stella and Goose and Instagram https://www.instagram.com/p/CdLyudUrY3Z/?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=
